satellite_network_attribute_functions.maximum_transmission_distance module¶

satellite_network_attribute_functions.maximum_transmission_distance.maximum_transmission_distance(constellation_name: str) → float[source]¶

Returns the maximum transmission distance for a given constellation (based on satellite hardware specifications). :param constellation_name: name of satellite network constellation, e.g. Starlink-550 :return: the maximum transmission distance (as dictated by hardware specifications) between satellites.

LEO_Satellite_Network_Topology_Design
